title: System & Network Engineer
desc: Providing first-line operational support for enterprise IT infrastructure, including virtualized environments, Windows servers, and corporate networks. Monitoring systems, handling incidents via ITSM workflows, and performing routine maintenance to ensure service availability.
highlights: Monitoring infrastructure and responding to alerts to maintain service continuity.
Performing initial troubleshooting and resolution based on procedures and runbooks.
Supporting daily operations in VMware ESXi and Windows Server environments.
Verifying and reviewing backup jobs using Veeam to support data protection readiness.
Documenting procedures and operational notes to improve ITSM knowledge sharing.
Assisting senior engineers with escalations and infrastructure change activities.
Exploring automation and reporting improvements using Power BI, Python, and internal tools.

title: Computer Science Student
desc: Building a strong foundation in computer science, software development, and modern computing systems through coursework and hands-on learning.
highlights: Studying core CS subjects such as algorithms, data structures, operating systems, and computer networks.
Learning software engineering principles and fundamentals of backend and full-stack development.
Gaining practical exposure to databases, distributed systems concepts, and system design.
Exploring introductory AI, machine learning, and theoretical foundations of computing.
